name: Bonnie vs Homework
description:
Bonnie vs Homework a simple game with a simple premise destroy as many scrolls as you can, dodge as many pencils as you can, and survive for as long as you can.  Your goal is to accumulate the highest score possible, you have three lives! Good Luck! 

Backstory: Bonnie found that his owner Dave wasn't spending enough time with him, he was always sitting at his doing his homework. Bonnie felt like it was his responsibility to save Dave from the Evil Homework. To get to Dave he must go through waves and waves of Homework and Pencils. He hopes to find many power-ups on the way!
